title: El Nino a challenge; RBI striving for 4% CPI: Shaktikanta Das
description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Shaktikanta Das has said that the central bank will strive to get headline inflation under the 4 per cent target but flagged El Nino as a challenge to curb food inflation, in an interview to PTI Bhasha. "We continue to be watchful on the inflation front. We expec...
